column5: This beach front property is beautiful with unobstructed ocean views. Four bedrooms: which offers two master suites, both with king size beds and two bedrooms and 3 1/2 baths. Plenty of space in this open floor plan that has several decks for enjoying the sun. If sand and sea is what you are looking for, you have found the right house!
column8: Another Day: New Beach Front 4 Bedroom 3.5 bath
